Test.Comment: Test INSTREAM specification DECIMAL 1. IMPORT-Kommando: das Tausendertrennzeichen ist der Defaultwert (= nichts) und als Dezimalpunkt wird ein vom Default abweichender Wert gewaehlt - ein Komma 2. IMPORT-Kommando: Tausendertrennzeichen (= Komma) <> Defaultwert; Dezimalpunkt = Default

IMPORT TABLE import_table.Ftest200 DATA INSTREAM '<infile_path>load_test200_2.data' DECIMAL '/,//' A 1 B 2 PAGE WITH 80% USAGE
SELECT * FROM import_table.Ftest200

Test.Comment: Test INSTREAM specification DECIMAL 1. IMPORT-Kommando: Tausendertrennzeichen (= Komma) <> Defaultwert; Dezimalpunkt (= Punkt) <> Defaultwert 2. IMPORT-Kommando: Tausendertrennzeichen (= Komma) <> Defaultwert; Dezimalpunkt = Default

Error.ErrorMessage: Syntax error at position 141 (Unexpected token: "|"); check for typing errors

Test.Comment: Check functionality for DELIMITER and SEPARATOR specification All single tests check for delimiters/separators that are not default values. Additionally the data contain those delimiters/separators.

Statement.CallString: CREATE TABLE import_table.Ftest205 (A CHAR(10), B INTEGER, C BOOLEAN, D CHAR(20))
IMPORT TABLE import_table.Ftest205 DATA INSTREAM '<infile_path>load_test205.data' SEPARATOR '/' DELIMITER '*' START 1 5 A 1 B 2 C 3 D 4 PAGE WITH 80% USAGE
SELECT * FROM import_table.Ftest205
DROP TABLE import_table.Ftest205
CREATE TABLE import_table.Ftest205 (A CHAR(10), B INTEGER, C BOOLEAN, D CHAR(20))
IMPORT TABLE import_table.Ftest205 DATA INSTREAM '<infile_path>load_test205.data' DELIMITER '' START 6 5 A 1 B 2 C 3 D 4 PAGE WITH 80% USAGE
SELECT * FROM import_table.Ftest205
DROP TABLE import_table.Ftest205
CREATE TABLE import_table.Ftest205 (A CHAR(10), B INTEGER, C BOOLEAN, D CHAR(20))
IMPORT TABLE import_table.Ftest205 DATA INSTREAM '<infile_path>load_test205.data' DELIMITER '-' START 11 5 A 1 B 2 C 3 D 4 PAGE WITH 80% USAGE
SELECT * FROM import_table.Ftest205
DROP TABLE import_table.Ftest205
CREATE TABLE import_table.Ftest205 (A CHAR(10), B INTEGER, C BOOLEAN, D CHAR(20))
IMPORT TABLE import_table.Ftest205 DATA INSTREAM '<infile_path>load_test205.data' SEPARATOR '|' START 16 5 A 1 B 2 C 3 D 4 PAGE WITH 80% USAGE
SELECT * FROM import_table.Ftest205

Test.Comment: Check functionality for DELIMITER and SEPARATOR specification The data consists of a single field; Loader must make sure to remove all leading and/or trailing blanks

Statement.CallString: CREATE TABLE import_table.Ftest206 (a CHAR(10))
IMPORT TABLE import_table.Ftest206 DATA INSTREAM '<infile_path>load_test206.data' A 1 PAGE WITH 80% USAGE
SELECT * FROM import_table.Ftest206

Statement.CallString: CREATE TABLE import_table.Ftest56 (a CHAR(10), b CHAR(5), c CHAR(5))
CREATE INDEX Ftest56_idx ON import_table.Ftest56 (a)
IMPORT TABLE import_table.Ftest56 DATA INSTREAM '<infile_path>load_test55.data' A 1 B 2 C 3 PAGE WITH 80% USAGE

Test.Comment: Load data into table with a single mandatory column (NOT NULL). 1. Step: Data for mandatory column is not given while it is specified in the command. Loader must stop on error. 2. Step: Same as 1st step but MAXERRORCOUNT is raised. Loader must stop on error different from 1st step error. 3. Step: Data for mandatory column is not specified in the command. Loader must stop on error.

Statement.CallString: CREATE TABLE import_table.Ftest57 (a CHAR(10) NOT NULL, b CHAR(10), c CHAR(10))
IMPORT TABLE import_table.Ftest57 DATA INSTREAM '<infile_path>load_test57.data' B 1 C 2 A 3 PAGE WITH 80% USAGE

Test.Comment:
Test loading into DB data type CHAR BYTE
Load CHAR BYTE into a table with a CHAR BYTE column. This single column is primary key column, too. This means it is variable long (saved in DB page). All values are filled up to the define length of that column. Thus they must be trimmed during load. At IMPORT the values are trimmed by the kernel during insertion. At IMPORT the Loader must trim the values during insertion.

Statement.CallString: CREATE TABLE import_table.Ftest16 (a CHAR(10) BYTE primary key)
IMPORT TABLE import_table.Ftest16 DATA INSTREAM '<infile_path>load_test16.data' A 1 PAGE WITH 80% USAGE
SELECT ASCII(a) FROM import_table.Ftest16
SELECT A from import_table.Ftest16 WHERE A BETWEEN x'7465737431' and x'746573743130'
SELECT A from import_table.Ftest16 WHERE A = x'746573743130'

Test.Comment: Test loading into DB data type CHAR BYTE: expected error because of wrong value in data file
